import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import userData from '../App'; import '../styles/nav.scss'; export default function Navbar() { const months = [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December', ]; const [margin, setMargin] = useState({margin:'10px'}) const [month, setMonth] = useState(null); const user = useContext(userData); window.addEventListener('scroll', (e) => { if (window.scrollY >= 50) { setMargin({ margin: '30px' }) window.scrollTo(window.scrollY+20+'px') } }); return (
MyCalendarApp
  • Home (current)
  • Friends
  • Create
    {months.map((month, index) => ( setMonth(index)} class="dropdown-item" > {months[index]} ))}
    • {/*
  • Chat

); }
